result.execSummary:
The defendant Amanda Pamela Lilteich was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).
  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).
  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: To Pretrial Incarceration Credit.
Three (3) Character letters filed by Atty. Smith

Defendant Amanda Pamela Lilteich in court with attorney Joseph Smith.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties proceed to sentencing on Cts. 1, 2 and 3. 


Court orders the following: 
Ct. 1:
-  90 days jail straight time consecutive to Cts. 2 and 3 Stayed for 2 years Probation - concurrent to Cts. 2 and 3
- Court Cost of $243.00 - apply bail 
- Conditions of Probation: Maintain absolute sobriety - no drugs/alcohol.  Follow thru with any treatment or evaluations ordered by Agent. No contact with the victim or her family or their residence where they live.  DNA surcharge is waived.

Ct. 2:
-  90 days jail straight time consecutive to Cts. 1 and 3 Stayed for 2 years Probation - concurrent to Cts. 1 and 3
- Court Cost of $243.00 - apply bail 
- Conditions of Probation: Maintain absolute sobriety - no drugs/alcohol.  Follow thru with any treatment or evaluations ordered by Agent. No contact with the victim or her family or their residence where they live.  DNA surcharge is waived.

Ct. 3:
-  90 days jail straight time consecutive to Cts. 1 and 2 Stayed for 2 years Probation - concurrent to Cts. 1 and 2
- Court Cost of $243.00 - apply remainder of bail - balance to be paid as a Condition of Probation; alternate 5 days jail - consecutive 
- Conditions of Probation: Maintain absolute sobriety - no drugs/alcohol.  Follow thru with any treatment or evaluations ordered by Agent. No contact with the victim or her family or their residence where they live.  DNA surcharge is waived.
Sentencing hearing on July 11, 2014 at 09:00 am.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Amanda Pamela Lilteich in court with attorney Joseph Smith.  Brian J Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant enters a guilty plea as to the counts 1, 2, & 3 in the amended information.  Court finds the defendant guilty.  Defense requests a separate sentencing date.   Court grants request.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 11, 2014 at 09:00 am.

From ADA Juech requesting an adjournment of the Jury Trial currently scheduled for June 10, 2014.  Court has reviewed and denied the request.  The Court will address the issue at the Jury Status on June 5, 2014.
